org.jcatapult.jpa
Class EntityManagerProxy

java.lang.Object
  org.jcatapult.jpa.EntityManagerProxy
All Implemented Interfaces:
EntityManager
public class EntityManagerProxy
extends Object
implements EntityManager

This class is a proxy that allows an EntityManager to be injected into services but lazily initialized from the EntityManagerContext. The issue is that if a service needs an EntityManager and the JCatapultFilter hasn't been invoked yet, the EntityManagerContext will be empty, which causes Guice to explode. This class allows the injection of the EntityManager to occur and the the EntityManagerContext to be called only when the methods are invoked, which SHOULD always be during a request that goes through the filter.

NOTE: This class is NOT thread safe in anyway at all! Don't even think about using it across threads or you will suffer major consequences. You have been warned ;)
